page.title: 02Class Survey-Mortimer Shops
page.content: Twice as many do main food shopping in Reading as compared with village shoppers. Many visit hypermarket between Theale and Reading. The majority do occasional shopping in Mortimer. Village improvements suggested:- dentist, street lights, gas supply, improved childrens play area, special childrens room in pubs, sports centre, swimming pool. Local family businesses are generous in village community events.{Checklist of {village shops:}post office/stationer; car-sellers-2; grocer,supermarkets-3; newsagents-2; butcher; chemist; hard- ware; estate agents-2; knitting wool/ clothing; hairdressers; baker; video hire; swimming pool supplier; green- grocer/off-licence/stationery/gifts; second-hand goods; coal/coke/bottled gas; farm shop/pick-your-own; audio systems components; mobile wet fish.
